channel.title: How do I add this to my server? picture inside
channel.description:
Hi, I went on a server and I saw this:
[IMG]http://i195.photobucket.com/albums/z82/musicmad441/frojooscape.jpg[/img]
and I was wondering how I add it? because it looks great and it has alot of space. I will rep [IMG]http://i195.photobucket.com/albums/z82/musicmad441/frojooscape.jpg[/img]

item.title: How do I add this to my server? picture inside
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

Add this void:

public void infoBox()
	{
		int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();

setInterfaceWalkable(15892);

		sendQuest("@whi@Stats:", 15894); //Title

		//Left hand side
		sendQuest("@whi@Kills: @gre@"+killcount, 15895);
		sendQuest("@whi@Deaths: @gre@"+deathcount, 15897);
		sendQuest("", 15898);
		sendQuest("", 15899);
		sendQuest("", 15900);
		sendQuest("", 15901);

		//Right hand side
		sendQuest("", 15896);
		sendQuest("", 15902);
		sendQuest("", 15903);
		sendQuest("", 15904);
		sendQuest("", 15905);
		sendQuest("", 15906);

	}

Then in boolean process, or in a command, put:

infoBox();

Helped?

Read full topic

item.title: How do I add this to my server? picture inside
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

Add this void -

public void musicMad() { setInterfaceWalkable(15892); }

Then just code the sendFrame thing inside the void blah blah so it will show words.

Add this to boolean process()

musicMad();

No need to rep.
